DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this protocol is to evaluate the long-term safety of pregabalin in patients who participated in the previous fibromyalgia Study A0081100 and who wish to receive open-label pregabalin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: This Study is An Open-Label Trial Of Pregabalin In Patients With Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Patients must have met the inclusion criteria for the preceding fibromyalgia Protocol A0081100, and must have received pregabalin/placebo under doubleblind conditions. Patients may not participate in the study if they experienced a serious adverse event during the previous fibromyalgia Study A0081100 which was determined to be related to the study medication by the investigator or the sponsor.
